the people's Base was recieving massiave damage, why did they decide to
attack a half built base?.....Scamrock came running in and grabbed the
bombs, screaming, he threw the bombs over the hill, firing at Scattershot
screaming........Plintissa aimed the autoguns at Oblitercon, hoping to take
him out fast....Dracona also aimed at Oblitercon and they fired, making an x
that streamed in a pattern at Oblitercon.........Sinesis and sinister snuck
around the base and fired at Oblitercon, apparently they wanted th join the
people's Group.....
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 27, 2000 3:19 PM
Subject: Re: Fight


> Oblitertron/Nemesis Enforcer/Koga Shuko/Scattershot/Hades/Anubis/Unitron:
>
>
> Oblitertron let out an evil laughed as Radistor split apart, Breakdown
taking
> over at this moment in a battle:
>
> ( Dark One's essence surged forward, taking the shape of his body at a
> yellowish tunnel, grabbing Pyro, he pulled his fellow comrade back,
kneeing
> him the back, Breakdown flying in, uppercutting Dark One, then flying into
> the tunnel)
>
> After a minute of not moving, Oblitertron came back to life, Dark One in
> control, falling to one knee from not moving from the autoguns' attacks,
> firing an optic blast and a burst of flames simultaneously at the side of
the
> base, as he prepared to stand up.
> --------------
> Nemesis Enforcer stumbled back, a few autogun shots digging into his left
> side, firing off his last rocket off at a space in between two autoguns.
> --------------
> Anubis began to approach Nemesis, a single autogun shot hitting him in the
> side of his armored head, Anubis yelled in pain, falling to one knee,
firing
> off a missile at the People's base in anger.
> --------------
> Hades fired off a missile at the People's base, putting the launcher into
> subspace, as it ran out of ammo, taking out a laser rifle in one hand, an
uzi
> shaped weapon that fired shells.
> -------------
> Unitron fired off four shots (total) from his two laser rifles, the
kickback
> not even being noticed by him, two bolts heading at a autogun, another two
at
> a different autogun.
> -------------
> Koga Shuko yelled two bolts from the leader of the Radicons digging into
his
> heavily armored side, seeing Anubis screw up he sighed, not being able to
see
> his attacker, firing off a missile at the People's base, no longer able to
> see the Radicons.
> -------------
> Scattershot flew ahead, seeing the Radicons sitting down, except for the
> leader, taking out his last charges, he threw them down at the Radicons,
> taking out his machine gun that fired explosive rounds, about to show
those
> punks why he was called Scattershot.
